context_summary: B2B enterprise portal MVP for LATAM distribution company requiring role-based access, ERP integration, document management and multilingual support. Low risk tolerance. Medium budget sensitivity.

strategic_alignment.justification: Strong enterprise alignment and long-term scalability but potentially over-engineered for MVP stage.

architecture_impact.scalability_impact: Strong horizontal scalability for enterprise-grade workloads.
architecture_impact.operational_overhead: Requires DevOps maturity and experienced Java team.

learning_curve.team_readiness: Low if team lacks prior Liferay/Java enterprise experience.

ecosystem_maturity.long_term_viability: Strong enterprise presence and vendor backing.

executive_summary: Enterprise-ready platform with strong long-term scalability but potentially excessive operational overhead for MVP phase unless compliance or governance requirements demand it.
